required.title: Required
required.description:
Validates that a field is not empty. Objects are cast to arrays to check emptiness.

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->required
```

string.title: String
string.description:
Validates that a value is a string

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->string
```

int.title: Int
int.description:
Validates that a value is an integer. In strict mode (default), only true integers are accepted

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->int(true)
```

**Parameters:**
- `strict`: true

strict.description: Strict mode: true for integers only

array.title: Array
array.description:
Validates that a value is an array

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->array
```

object.title: Object
object.description:
Validates that a value is an object

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->object
```

between.title: Between
between.description:
Validates that a value is between two bounds. Supports numeric values and DateTime objects

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->between(18, 65)
```

**Parameters:**
- `min`: 18
- `max`: 65

date.title: Date
date.description:
Validates that a value is a valid date in the specified format. Performs strict validation

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->date("Y-m-d")
```

**Parameters:**
- `format`: 'Y-m-d'

alphanumeric.title: Alphanumeric
alphanumeric.description:
Validates that a value contains only alphanumeric characters

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->alphanumeric
```

maxLength.title: MaxLength
maxLength.description:
Validates that a string does not exceed maximum length

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->maxLength(20)
```

**Parameters:**
- `max`: 20

disposableEmail.title: DisposableEmail
disposableEmail.description:
Validates that an email is not from a disposable domain

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->disposableEmail([])
```

**Parameters:**
- `disposables`: []

disposableUrlDomain.title: DisposableUrlDomain
disposableUrlDomain.description:
Validates that a URL is not from a disposable/temporary domain (URL shorteners, free hosting, etc.)

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("website")->disposableUrlDomain
```
```php
$verifier->field("website")->disposableUrlDomain(["bit.ly", "tinyurl.com"])
```

**Parameters:**
- `disposables`: []

url.title: Url
url.description:
Validates that a value is a valid URL with configurable schemes and TLD requirement

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("website")->url
```
```php
$verifier->field("api")->url(["http", "https", "ws", "wss"])
```
```php
$verifier->field("intranet")->url(["http"], requireTld: false)
```

**Parameters:**
- `schemes`: ["http","https"]
- `requireTld`: true

containsNumber.title: ContainsNumber
containsNumber.description:
Validates that a string contains at least one digit

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->containsNumber
```

notAlphanumeric.title: NotAlphanumeric
notAlphanumeric.description:
Validates that a value contains non-alphanumeric characters

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->notAlphanumeric
```

minLength.title: MinLength
minLength.description:
Validates that a string has a minimum length

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->minLength(8)
```

**Parameters:**
- `min`: 8

containsUpper.title: ContainsUpper
containsUpper.description:
Validates that a string contains at least one uppercase letter

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->containsUpper
```

email.title: Email
email.description:
Validates that a value is a valid email address

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->email
```

regex.title: Regex
regex.description:
Validates that a value matches a regular expression pattern. Warnings are suppressed

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->regex("/^[A-Z]+$/")
```

**Parameters:**
- `pattern`: '/^[A-Z]+$/'

ipAddress.title: IpAddress
ipAddress.description:
Validates that a value is a valid IP address (IPv4 or IPv6)

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->ipAddress
```

containsLower.title: ContainsLower
containsLower.description:
Validates that a string contains at least one lowercase letter

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->containsLower
```

containsSpecialCharacter.title: ContainsSpecialCharacter
containsSpecialCharacter.description:
Validates that a string contains at least one special character

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->containsSpecialCharacter
```

greaterThan.title: GreaterThan
greaterThan.description:
Validates that a value is greater than a specified limit

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->greaterThan(18)
```

**Parameters:**
- `min`: 18

min.description: Value must be greater than this

lowerThan.title: LowerThan
lowerThan.description:
Validates that a value is less than a specified limit

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->lowerThan(65)
```

**Parameters:**
- `max`: 65

max.description: Value must be less than this

notIn.title: NotIn
notIn.description:
Validates that a value does not exist in a forbidden list or as an object property

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->notIn(["admin", "root"])
```

**Parameters:**
- `forbidden`: ["admin","root"]

forbidden.description: Array or object of forbidden values

in.title: In
in.description:
Validates that a value exists in an allowed list or as an object property

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->in(["active", "pending"])
```

**Parameters:**
- `allowed`: ["active","pending"]

allowed.description: Array or object of allowed values

boolean.title: Boolean
boolean.description:
Validates that a value is a boolean. In strict mode (default), only true/false are accepted

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->boolean(true)
```

**Parameters:**
- `strict`: true

strict.description: Strict mode: true for booleans only

json.title: Json
json.description:
Validates that a string is valid JSON

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->json
```

numeric.title: Numeric
numeric.description:
Validates that a value is numeric

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->numeric
```

fileMime.title: FileMime
fileMime.description:
Validates that a file has an allowed MIME type

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->fileMime("image/jpeg")
```

**Parameters:**
- `mime`: 'image/jpeg'

fileExists.title: FileExists
fileExists.description:
Validates that a file exists at the given path

**Usage:**
```php
$verifier->field("test")->fileExists
```
